description:
http://anidb.net/ch89407 [Saeki Yuuka] is a middle school student who often encounters people in need of help. One day, she helps a strange, round, squishy creature... which turns out to be an underground dweller named http://anidb.net/ch89406 [Chii-chan]! After helping him, the kind Yuuka brings Chii-chan home to live with her. This super cute comedy about the pre-chi-ous Chii-chan has begun!
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan the underground dweller has come from beneath the earth to taste the delicious sweets on the surface... but then he got stuck and couldn`t get back home. The one who arrived to help him was Yuka, a middle school girl who seems to frequently encounter people who need help. After being saved by Yuka, Chi-chan makes a decision!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pripri Chi-chan Is Here!
Puripuri! Chii-chan ga Yatte Kita Dechi!
プリプリ! ちぃちゃんがやってきたでち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan befriends Uc-chan, an alien that Yuka saved, and they both decide to repay Yuka for her kindness! So Uc-chan, who excels at inventing things, makes something for Chi-chan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bikkuri!? Puripuri Shot Dechi!
Surprise?! A Pripri Shot!
びっくり!? プリプリショットでち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan decides to accompany Yuka to school. He turns himself into a charm hanging from her bag so that no one will recognize him as an underground dweller! When they get to school, they find Yuka`s friend Ara-chan worrying about something...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Exciting! Chi-chan Goes to School!
Wakuwaku! Chii-chan Gakkou e Iku Dechi!
ワクワク! ちぃちゃん学校へ行くでち!

REGULAR.description:
Today the whole gang is going to the shopping center. Chi-chan and Uc-chan are thrilled to be seeing one for the first time! Chi-chan and Uc-chan part ways with Yuka inside, and just as the two of them are having a blast together...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokidoki! Odekake wa Kiken ga Ippai Dechi!
Thrilling! The Many Dangers of Going Out!
ドキドキ! おでかけは危険がいっぱいでち!

REGULAR.description:
Joe-kun, an underground dweller, has come to the surface to rescue Chi-chan, who never returned home after coming above ground. He sneaks into Yuka`s house and begins his rescue mission!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jo, Jo! I`m Gonna Save Chi-chan, Jo!
Jojo! Chii-chan o Sukuu jo Dechi!
じょじょ! ちぃちゃんを救うじょでち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan, Uc-chan, and Joe-kun form a team to repay Yuka`s kindness together! They use the PriPri Shot to try to make Yuka happy. Can they succeed in repaying their debt to Yuka?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bumblers! Gotta Do Lots to Repay Yuka!
Heppoko! Yuuka ni Ippai Ongaeshi Dechi!
へっぽこ! ゆーかにいっぱい恩返しでち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan, Uc-chan, and Joe-kun decide to go to school with Yuka again. While they`re there, one of Yuka`s schoolmates, a boy named Suo-kun, figures out what Chi-chan really is...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Happy! Akari-chan no Tanjoubi Dechi!
Happy! It`s Akari-chan`s Birthday!
ハッピー! あかりちゃんの誕生日でち!

REGULAR.description:
The Bumbler Trio is working hard to repay their debts by picking up trash. As they`re walking, they find a hole in the dirt that leads underground, and poking out from the hole is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kirakira! Dekoru no Daisuki Non-chan Desu non! Dechi!
Sparkle! I`m Non-chan, and I Love to Decorate, Non!
キラキラ! デコるの大好きのんちゃんですのん! でち!

REGULAR.description:
The Bumbler Trio is worried that Yuka is under a lot of stress because of Chi-chan, so they enter her dream to try to help her work off her stress...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Snooze... A Trip to Yuka`s Dream!
Suyasuya... Yuuka no Yume e Odekake Dechi!
スヤスヤ... ゆーかの夢へおでかけでち!

REGULAR.description:
The Bumbler Trio is concerned about Yuka`s awkward relationship with her mother, so they decide to reveal their existence to her mother and help the two get along better...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chills! The Plan to Help Yuka and Her Mom Get Along!
Hiyahiya! Yuuka to Mama no Nakayoshi Daisakusen Dechi!
ヒヤヒヤ! ゆーかとママの仲良し大作戦でち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan had decided to return to the underground for a visit, but he`s put on so much weight that he can`t fit through the hole! So the Bumbler Trio decides to try going on a diet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Butterball?! I Want to Slim Down!
Deppuri!? Slim ni Naritai Dechi!
でっぷり!? スリムになりたいでち!

REGULAR.description:
Yuka agrees to go accompany the others on their visit to the underground. They all head there together to see the land where Chi-chan was born!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guragura! Chitei e Satogaeri Dechi!
Mole, Mole! Paying a Visit Underground!
グラグラ! 地底へ里帰りでち!

REGULAR.description:
Yuka is worried because Joe-kun hasn`t come to visit lately. It turns out Joe-kun has been busy looking after his triplet siblings, so the other decide to help him out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jo Jo Jo!? Akachan Panic Dechi!
Jo, Jo, Jo?! It`s a Baby Panic!
じょじょじょ!? 赤ちゃんパニックでち!

REGULAR.description:
As Chi-chan and friends are relaxing in Yuka`s room, they notice a strange figure taking pictures of them through the window. They open the window, and there stands Reporter-kun, a reporter for the underground magazine "Weekly Underground" who`s come to make an article about Chi-chan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pashapasha! Chiteijin Kisha no Dai Scoop Dechi!
Snap, Snap! The Underground Reporter`s Big Scoop!
パシャパシャ! 地底人記者の大スクープでち!

REGULAR.description:
Yuka`s mom wants to have a boy who was Yuka`s childhood friend come over to be her tutor, but Yuka is against the idea, leading to an argument. Yuka seems to be acting much more adamant then usual. Then the boy in question drops by...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geki Oko! Kateikyoushi Nante Iranai! Dechi!
Outrage! I Don`t Need a Home Tutor!
ゲキオコ! 家庭教師なんていらないっ! でち!

REGULAR.description:
To make the most of a hot summer, the gang invites Suo-kun and Akari-chan for a day at the beach! As they`re all playing in the ocean, Akari-chan loses her floatie. Chi-chan uses the PriPri Shot to try to order it, but what appears is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sansan! Natsu no Umi o Mankitsu Dechi!
Shine! Enjoying the Sea in Summer!
サンサン! 夏の海をまんきつでち!

REGULAR.description:
Uc-chan reflects on the day she arrived on Earth, and her first meetings with Chi-chan and all the others. Sometimes she feels homesick for her home planet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Could It Be?! Uc-chan Says Goodbye?!
Masaka!? Ucchan Owakare Dechi!?
まさか!? うっちゃんお別れでち!?

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan wants to go on a family vacation to make some summer memories, so Yuka`s mom suggests a trip to a hot spring in return for helping her around the house. They invite Non-chan, and the gang is off to the hot spring!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatehate? Kazokuryokou ni Shuppatsu Dechi!
What Could This Be? Setting Off on a Family Vacation!
ハテハテ? 家族旅行に出発でち!

REGULAR.description:
Doctor Hatena, an underground dweller summoned by Chi-chan`s PriPri Shot, joins the gang, and they finally arrive at the hot spring lodge! They spend the day enjoying the outdoor bath, table tennis, and more at the lodge, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos! Running Wild at the Hot Spring Lodge?!
Dotabata! Onsen Ryoukan de Oohashagi Dechi!?
ドタバタ! 温泉旅館でおおはしゃぎでち!?

REGULAR.description:
Yuka is struggling with her art homework because she isn`t a good painter. She`s supposed to paint a picture of some fruit, but as Chi-chan is showing her some painting techniques, he eats all the fruit. So he tries to order some more fruit with the PriPri Shot...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mogyu! Fruits Sannin Musume Dechi!
Mogyu! The Three Fruit Girls!
もぎゅっ! フルーツ三人娘でち!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma invites Yuka on a picnic to take a break from studying. Yuka isn`t into the idea at all at first, but Chi-chan says he wants to go to a flower park. So they also invite Suo-kun and Akari-chan along, and the whole gang sets off for a picnic!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Chaos Ensues in a Battle for Love?!
Gekitotsu! Koi no Battle de Oosawagi Dechi!?
ゲキトツ! 恋のバトルで大騒ぎでち!?

REGULAR.description:
Yuka is suffering from fatigue caused by the summer heat, anf the Bumbler Trio is worried that it`s their fault. What plan will they come up with to make Yuka feel better?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oh, No! Yuka`s Suffering from Summer Heat Fatigue!
Taihen! Yuuka ga Natsubate Dechi!
たいへん! ゆーかが夏バテでち!

REGULAR.description:
Emi-chan hopes to become a manga artist one day. She asks Yuka for opinions on the manga she`s working on, but Yuka isn`t sure what she should tell her. So Chi-chan uses the PriPri Shot to summon a manga professional to help...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ganbare! Emi-chan wa Mangaka no Tamago Dechi!
Go for It! Emi-chan Is an Aspiring Manga Artist!
がんばれ! えみちゃんは漫画家の卵でち!

REGULAR.description:
The gang is going out, but Yuka and Uc-chan can`t decide what to wear. So Chi-chan tries to order something that`ll pick an outfit for them, but he ends up summoning the famous high-charisma fashion designer from the underground, Chiteko!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chite Colle! Fashion Show Teko! Dechi!
Under Colle! It`s a Fashion Show, Teko!
チテコレ! ファッションショーてこ! でち!

REGULAR.description:
Joe-kun arrives at Yuka`s house with a picture book. Chi-chan uses the PriPri Shot to order something that`ll allow them to read it together, and a giant pillow appears! So they try putting the book under the pillow and sleeping on it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mejikara! Ehon no Sekai de Daibouken Dechi!
Piercing Eyes! Adventure in a Picture Book World!
メヂカラ! 絵本の世界で大冒険でち!

REGULAR.description:
Yuka is very worried after being placed in the dodgeball event, her least favorite, in her school`s upcoming ball sports meet. So the gang decides to try intensive training so that she`ll no longer be scared to play dodgeball! Chi-chan uses the PriPri Shot to order something for their training, and the result is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Spopopo! Yuka`s Intensive Dodgeball Training!
Supopopo! Yuuka no Dodgeball Tokkun Dechi!
スポポポ! ゆーかのドッジボール特訓でち!

REGULAR.description:
Yuka`s class is having an extracurricular lesson today. Chi-chan and the gang joins her for a day gathering plants on Kappa Mountain. Suo-kun insists that there are kappas on Kappa Mountain, so they all go looking for one...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shock! We Run Into You-Know-Who on the Mountain!
Shougeki! Yama de Aitsu ni Souguu Dechi!
ショーゲキ! 山でアイツにそうぐうでち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan is feeling down, so Yuka and the others try everything they can to bring him back to his cheerful self. Then, when they try using the PriPri Shot to order something that might help...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dechi Dechi! Robo Chii-chan Dechi! Dechi!
Dechi, Dechi! It`s Robo Chi-chan!
デチデチ! ロボチィチャンデチ! でち!

REGULAR.description:
It`s Yuka`s birthday, so the Bumbler Trio has a meeting to decide what present they should give her. They decide to cook something tasty for her, so they order something with the PriPri Shot to help...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Joy! It`s Yuka`s Birthday!
Ukiuki! Yuuka no Tanjoubi Dechi!
ウキウキ! ゆーかの誕生日でち!

REGULAR.description:
Uc-chan has finished repairing her UFO, so she takes Chi-chan and Joe-kun for a ride... but with both of them on board, the UFO crashes into Pii-chan! The gang decides to look after Pii-chan until its injuries heal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peck, Peck, Peck! Taking Care of Pii-chan!
Sukokoko! Pii-chan Osewa Suru Dechi!
スコココ! ピィちゃんお世話するでち!

REGULAR.description:
With all the rainy weather lately, Chi-chan can`t dry his pants, and his last pair is blown away by the wind. He tries using the PriPri Shot to order something that`ll help him get his pants back...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nin, Nin! I Have to Get My Pants Back!
Ninnin! Pantsu o Torimodose Dechi!
ニンニン! パンツをとりもどせでち!

REGULAR.description:
As he argues with Joe-kun over who should clean Yuka`s room, Chi-chan starts to wish he had a room of his own. So everyone decides to use the magic wands he ordered with the PriPri Shot to create a room for him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pri-tty! Let`s Design a Cute Room!
Puri Chii! Kawaii Oheya o Tsukuru Dechi!
プリちぃ! カワイイお部屋をつくるでち!

REGULAR.description:
Yuka has a singing test coming up tomorrow, so Chi-chan and the others decide to practice with her. They use the PriPri Shot to order something that might help, but what appears before them is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Norinori! Uta no Lesson Dechi!
Singing Lessons! Move to the Music!
ノリノリ! 歌のレッスンでち!

REGULAR.description:
The gang looks outside one day to see the world covered in white! And so Chi-chan and company head out to play in the snow. They use the PriPri Shot to try to order a snow hut, and then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ugo Ugo! Yukiotoko to Asobu Dechi!
Ugo, Ugo! Playing with a Yeti!
ウゴウゴ! 雪男とあそぶでち!

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan receives a letter from his father on the day before the Festival of the Stars, a major festival in his underground hometown. So Chi-chan, Joe-kun, and Uc-chan set off to the underground to see the festival, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell?! Saying Goodbye to Yuka?! (Part 1)
Sayonara!? Yuuka to Owakare Dechi!? (Zenpen)
さよなら!? ゆーかとお別れでち!? (前編)

REGULAR.description:
Chi-chan and the others tried to get back home to Yuka, but the opening to the surface has been covered up! Will Chi-chan, Joe-kun, and Uc-chan ever reunite with Yuka?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell?! Saying Goodbye to Yuka?! (Part 2)
Sayonara!? Yuuka to Owakare Dechi!? (Kouhen)
さよなら!? ゆーかとお別れでち!? (後編)
Puripuri Chii-chan!!
Pripri Chi-chan!!
プリプリちぃちゃん!!
噗利噗利奇!!
噗利噗利奇!!
Pripri Chii-chan!!
